algorithm_technique: Convert words to their numerical values by mapping letters to digits and then to integers.
problem_summary_simple: Check if the numerical value of the target word equals the sum of the numerical values of two other words.
problem_summary_technical: Convert strings to integers based on letter-to-digit mapping ('a'->0, 'b'->1, ...) and compare sums.
key_insights: The problem requires a custom string-to-integer conversion based on letter positions.
The constraint on letters ('a' to 'j') simplifies the conversion logic.
Directly calculating and comparing the sums is the most straightforward approach.
